This package is a suite of tools for users of the Phanstiel Lab's genomic data processing pipelines
text: can install development version dietJuicerTools GitHub :

title: This package is a suite of tools for users of the Phanstiel Lab's genomic data processing pipelines
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(dietJuicerTools) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Create an ATAC-seq data samplesheet for bagPipes — atac_samplesheet
title: Create an ATAC-seq data samplesheet for bagPipes — atac_samplesheet
Create an ATAC-seq data samplesheet for bagPipes — atac_samplesheet
code: atac_samplesheet(   Project,   Cell_Type,   nSamples,   nReps,   Genotype,   Bio_Rep,   Tech_Rep,   Read1,   Read2,   Sequencing_Directory )

title: Create an ATAC-seq data samplesheet for bagPipes — atac_samplesheet
text: Project character value specifying project data Cell_Type character value specifying cell type using nSamples numeric specifying number samples nReps numeric specifying number biological replicates Genotype character, list, vector value specifying cell type using Bio_Rep numeric specifying many biological replicates per unique genotype Tech_Rep numeric specifying many technical replicates per biological replicate Read1 character value specifying file path first .fq.gz file extension Read2 character value specifying file path second .fq.gz file extension Sequencing_Directory character value specifying file path housing .fq.gz files

title: Create an ATAC-seq data samplesheet for bagPipes — atac_samplesheet

what: Create a ChIP-seq/CUT&RUN data samplesheet for bagPipes — chip_samplesheet
title: Create a ChIP-seq/CUT&RUN data samplesheet for bagPipes — chip_samplesheet
Create a ChIP-seq/CUT&RUN data samplesheet for bagPipes — chip_samplesheet
code: chip_samplesheet(   Project,   Cell_Type,   nSamples,   nReps,   Genotype,   Bio_Rep,   Tech_Rep,   Read1,   Read2,   Sequencing_Directory,   singleEnd = FALSE )

title: Create a ChIP-seq/CUT&RUN data samplesheet for bagPipes — chip_samplesheet
text: Project character value specifying project data Cell_Type character value specifying cell type using nSamples numeric specifying number samples nReps numeric specifying number biological replicates Genotype character, list, vector value specifying cell type using Bio_Rep numeric specifying many biological replicates per unique genotype Tech_Rep numeric specifying many technical replicates per biological replicate Read1 character value specifying file path first .fq.gz file extension Read2 character value specifying file path second .fq.gz file extension Sequencing_Directory character value specifying file path housing .fq.gz files singleEnd logical value specifying whether data single-end sequenced

title: Create a ChIP-seq/CUT&RUN data samplesheet for bagPipes — chip_samplesheet
